articles.description: Scotland will host England in front of a record home crowd in Edinburgh but the visitors are preparing to "ruin" the party in the Women's Six Nations.

articles.description: NFL great Tom Brady says he is 'not opposed' to coming out of retirement in the event of an emergency.
